22 struct PoseArrayData
23 {
24  std::mutex mtx;
25  std::atomic<bool> send_;
26  geometry_msgs::PoseArray poses_;
27  geometry_msgs::Pose robot_pose_;
28  std::atomic<double> map_size_;
29  std::atomic<double> resolution_;
30 };
31 PoseArrayData poseArrayBuffer_;
32 
38 PathSelection::PathSelection(ros::NodeHandle nh) : nh_(nh), it_(nh)
39 {
40  sub1_ = nh.subscribe("robot_0/odom", 1000, &PathSelection::odomCallBack, this); // get robot odom
41  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh); // transport image
42  sub2_ = it.subscribe("map_image/full", 1, &PathSelection::imageCallBack, this); // get map image
43  posePublisher_ = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseArray>("path", 100); // publishes created path
44  nh_.getParam("/local_map/map_resolution", resolution_); // get image resolution
45  nh_.getParam("/local_map/map_width", mapSize_); // get maps size
46  poseArrayBuffer_.send_ = false; // sets status to not send until poses are selected
47  poseArrayBuffer_.map_size_ = mapSize_; // store mapsize
48  poseArrayBuffer_.resolution_ = resolution_; // store resolution
49 }
50 
55 PathSelection::~PathSelection()
56 {
57  cv::destroyWindow("Path Selection");
58 }
59 
69 void callBackFunction(int event, int x, int y, int flags, void *param)
70 {
71  PoseArrayData *pose_array_buffer = ((PoseArrayData *)(param));
72 
73  if (event == cv::EVENT_LBUTTONDOWN)
74  {
75  std::cout << "Left Button of mouse click at Position [x,y] = [ " << x << " , " << y << " ]" << std::endl;
76  geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
77 
78  double centre = (pose_array_buffer->map_size_) / 2;
79 
80  pose.position.x = (double(x) - (centre)) * pose_array_buffer->resolution_;
81  pose.position.y = -(double(y) - (centre)) * pose_array_buffer->resolution_;
82  pose_array_buffer->mtx.lock();
83 
84  pose_array_buffer->poses_.poses.push_back(pose);
85  pose_array_buffer->mtx.unlock();
86  std::cout << "pixel position (" << x << ", " << y << ")" << std::endl;
87  std::cout << "Local position (" << pose.position.x << ", " << pose.position.y << ")" << std::endl;
88  }
89  else if (event == cv::EVENT_RBUTTONDOWN)
90  {
91  pose_array_buffer->mtx.lock();
92  if (pose_array_buffer->poses_.poses.size() > 0)
93  {
94  pose_array_buffer->send_ = true;
95  std::cout << "Right button of the mouse is clicked, Poses will be sent " << std::endl;
96  }
97  else
98  {
99  std::cout << " No poses Selected , can not be sent " << std::endl;
100  }
101  pose_array_buffer->mtx.unlock();
102  }
103 }
104 
110 void PathSelection::odomCallBack(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr &msg)
111 {
112  geometry_msgs::Pose pose = msg->pose.pose; // get robot location and odometry
113  poseArrayBuffer_.mtx.lock();
114  poseArrayBuffer_.robot_pose_ = pose;
115  poseArrayBuffer_.mtx.unlock();
116 }
117 
123 void PathSelection::imageCallBack(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr &msg)
124 {
125  try
126  {
127  if (enc::isColor(msg->encoding))
128  cvPtr_ = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, enc::BGR8);
129  else
130  cvPtr_ = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, enc::MONO8);
131  }
132  catch (cv_bridge::Exception &e)
133  {
134  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());
135  return;
136  }
137  imageDataBuffer_.mtx.lock();
138  imageDataBuffer_.imageDeque_.push_back(cvPtr_->image);
139 
140  if ((cvPtr_->image.cols != 200) || (cvPtr_->image.rows != 200))
141  {
142  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(60, "The image is not 200 x 200 what has gone wrong!");
143  }
144  imageDataBuffer_.timeStampDeque_.push_back(msg->header.stamp);
145  if (imageDataBuffer_.imageDeque_.size() > 3)
146  {
147  imageDataBuffer_.imageDeque_.pop_front(); // eliminate one element from the stack
148  imageDataBuffer_.timeStampDeque_.pop_front();
149  }
150 
151  imageDataBuffer_.mtx.unlock();
152 }
153 
158 void PathSelection::separateThread()
159 {
160  ros::Time timeImage = ros::Time::now();
161  cv::Mat image;
162  count_ = 0;
163  cv::namedWindow("Path Selection", CV_WINDOW_NORMAL);
164  cv::waitKey(50);
165  //cv::setMouseCallback("Path Selection", &callBackFunction, &poseArrayBuffer_);
166  cv::setMouseCallback("Path Selection", callBackFunction, &poseArrayBuffer_);
167  while (ros::ok())
168  {
169  // get map image
170  bool image_ok = false;
171  imageDataBuffer_.mtx.lock();
172  if (imageDataBuffer_.imageDeque_.size() > 0)
173  {
174  image = imageDataBuffer_.imageDeque_.front();
175  timeImage = imageDataBuffer_.timeStampDeque_.front();
176  imageDataBuffer_.imageDeque_.pop_front();
177  imageDataBuffer_.timeStampDeque_.pop_front();
178  image_ok = true;
179  }
180  imageDataBuffer_.mtx.unlock();
181  //check image and send poses
182  if (image_ok)
183  {
184  cv::Mat rgbImage;
185  cv::cvtColor(image, rgbImage, CV_GRAY2RGB);
186  cv::circle(rgbImage, cv::Point((image.rows / 2), (image.cols / 2)), 3, CV_RGB(255, 0, 255), 2);
187  if (poseArrayBuffer_.send_)
188  {
189  poseArrayBuffer_.mtx.lock();
190  poseArrayBuffer_.poses_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
191  posePublisher_.publish(poseArrayBuffer_.poses_);
192  poseArrayBuffer_.poses_.poses.clear();
193  poseArrayBuffer_.send_ = false;
194  poseArrayBuffer_.mtx.unlock();
195  cv::putText(rgbImage, "Sent Path.", cv::Point(30, 30),
196  cv::FONT_HERSHEY_COMPLEX_SMALL, 0.8, CV_RGB(200, 200, 250), 1, CV_AA);
197  cv::imshow("Path Selection", image);
198  cv::waitKey(3000); // waits for 3s so we can visualise this
199  }
200  else
201  {
202  cv::imshow("Path Selection", image);
203  cv::waitKey(5);
204  }
205  }
206  else
207  {
208  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(50));
209  }
210  }
211  std::cout << __func__ << " thread terminated" << std::endl;
212 }
